testcase.name: User Logins to application with valid username and valid password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User enters valid username "Sarah123" and password "SarahWilliams@123".passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User navigates to Home Page............................................passed

testcase.name: User should not be allowed to Login to application with invalid username and valid password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User enters invalid username "Sarah1234" and valid password "SarahWilliams@123".passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should not be able to login to application with invalid username..passed

testcase.name: User should not be allowed to Login to application with valid username and invalid password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User enters valid username "Sarah123" and invalid password "SarahWilliams@1234".passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should not be able to login to application with invalid password..passed

testcase.name: User should not be allowed to Login to application with only providing valid username and not providing password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User enters valid username "Sarah123" and not enters password..........passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should not be able to login to application with only username.....passed

testcase.name: User should not be allowed to Login to application by not entering username and entering only valid password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User not enters username and enters only valid password "SarahWilliams@123".passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should not be able to login to application with only password.....passed

testcase.name: User should not be allowed to Login to application with invalid username and invalid password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User enters invalid username "Sarah1234" and invalid password "SarahWilliams@1234".passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should not be able to login to application with invalid username and password.passed

testcase.name: User should not be allowed to login to application without entering username and password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should not be able to login to application without entering username and password.passed
